short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plug-in can recognize phonenumber on the browsing page, and combine Grandstream Wave to speed dial.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If the users want to make a quick call with Grandstream Wave on the browser page , they can install the extension. The extension will check the phone number on the browsing page and add a hyperlink once phone number detected. The users can click the phone number and launch the Grandstream Wave to make a call .
